alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 29 at 3:31AM MDT until March 29 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect from noon to 7 PM MDT Tuesday for gusty winds and low relative humidity, for fire weather zone 237, which includes Baca County... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 237... * Affected Area for Tuesday...Fire Weather Zone 237. * Winds Tuesday...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity Tuesday...As low as 4 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands
